title: Nepal Fights Deforestation, and Wins
description: An effort decades in the making is showing results in Nepal, a rare success story in a world of cascading climate disasters and despair.
dc:creator: Karan Deep Singh and Bhadra Sharma

media:content.media:credit: Karan Deep Singh/The New York Times
media:content.media:description: The community forests in Khairahani, Nepal, stretching over several tree-capped hills in March.
